title: Porter Honey-Mustard Dipping Sauce
full_text:
Porter Honey-Mustard Dipping Sauce
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
8 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2/3
cup
stone-ground or
spicy brown mustard
1/3
cup
honey
2
teaspoons
porter
Directions
Whisk all ingredients together in a medium bowl. Serve with fried chicken.
American
